title: Jordan Peterson is the Dr. Strange of the IDW/Avengers taking on Patreon
description:
What is the IDW about? If the group I think JBP is the only one really digging down in to deeper issues, the issues of the Twilight of the American Enlightenment. This is coming to a head with the Patreon debacle. Will the group survive if their non-corporal institution has to take on flesh? 

Heather Heyering on Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/Nbw3DoUOgtY

Review of Marsden's book https://paulvanderklay.me/2014/12/11/why-neither-the-religious-right-nor-secular-left-can-address-american-religious-pluralism/

George Marsden Twilight of the American Enlightenment https://www.amazon.com/Twilight-American-Enlightenment-Crisis-Liberal-ebook/dp/B00IHGVPG2 

E Weinstein on Rubin https://youtu.be/tUl7-SvntQ4
JBP and Rubin on Patreon https://youtu.be/GWz1RDVoqw4
Tim Keller Making Sense of God https://www.amazon.com/Making-Sense-God-Finding-Modern-ebook/dp/B01COJUG58

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
